ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:31:52 [Issue ID 4000-169517] urn:comicvine:4000-169517 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:42:29. [Issue ID 675562]
ComicInfo.Summary: With Great Hunger, There Must Also Come Great Hunger!: The Zombie Universes’ Spider-Man and Giant-Man are transported to the universe of earth Z (during the time of Amazing Spider-Man #68). Spider-Man attempts to be a hero again but ends up turning most of the sinister six into zombies, who in turn end up eating Peter Parker’s friends. The Spider-Man of Earth Z is killed by Sandman who turns homicidal when he sees the other sinister six killed by the zombie Spider-Man. Giant-Man eats the Watcher [Uatu].
ComicInfo.Title: With Great Hunger, There Must Also Come Great Hunger!
